items.sentence: I would never have done something like that.
Tom washes his hands before eating anything.
We could all stay together in the same room.
We need to know if Tom will be there or not.
Some of our meetings are open to the public.
Tom would probably be able fix that quickly.
I wish that I had a guitar as good as yours.
I wish that I'd done what Tom told me to do.
I'm sorry. I didn't mean for this to happen.
I didn't realize that you were already here.
Tom and his friends tore down the old house.
I think that Tom was too stunned to respond.
Lightning struck Tom's barn twice last year.
Tom hopes that the police don't arrest Mary.
Tom entertained us with a few funny stories.
Tom filled his and Mary's glasses with wine.
I put thirteen candles on the birthday cake.
I think it wouldn't be difficult to do that.
Tom was afraid somebody would recognize him.
I could go on, but I don't want to bore you.
